name: Grims Graveyard
description:
You and Grim have finally opened up your own Graveyard in an over emotional Village, but Grim has a very short temper and expects you to keep the graveyard running.

The Blue Bar in the Game represents Grims patience, when it reaches zero he comes for you, unburied Coffins makes him very unpatienced and he hates it when the Souls return to the body of the recently deceased.

Your Job is it to dig the graves, put the coffins in and fill the hole. After that an relative will visit the Grave and mourn until he dies from sadness of losing an relative, once the visitor is dead his Soul leaves the body which attracts Grim to collect it and he carries the corpse to the side and put it in a Coffin, ready to be buried, If Grim doesn't reach the Soul in Time it will return to the body and revive the visitor which will then run for their Life(literally).

Movement

W: Forward

A:Turn left

D:Turn Right

Left Mouse Button to Dig and Fill Holes and to pickup Coffins

Right Mouse to drop the Coffin onto the Ground or in a Hole

ESC to close the game
